But NOBODY answers the one question that needs to be answered. Who gave the orders in Iraq during the early days? Specifically, who gave Order number one and order number two which disbanded both the Baath Party and the army of Iraq? These orders killed thousands of our troops and hundreds of thousands of Iraqis. Simon Cowell is said to have finally persuaded US TV executives to give her a slot on the panel. " Simon Cowell is the boss of this show," a source told the News of the World. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl Cole . The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk. "The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen.
